p: To provide information on the type of institutions behind inventive activity directed to ZIKAV, assignees were classified as “academy”, “corporate” or “independent inventor”. Overall, 60% of patent family assignees were from academic institutions, whereas 30% were corporate and 10% were independent inventors (Fig. 5a). A separate analysis of the 14 Brazilian patents indicated that 60% were from independent inventors, 27% from academic institutions and 13% from corporations (Fig. 5b).
